sentence.Network_en: The aspectual contrast between perfective and imperfective is found in many Slavic languages.

sentence.Network_en: There is an aspectual difference between'He crossed the road'and'He was crossing the road'.
sentence.Network_cn: Hecrossedtheroad和 Hewascrossingtheroad 两句中动词的体是不同的.

list.abs: ...为要掌握真理，仅靠信仰是不够的，还要理性。不过，奥古斯丁理解的理性并不是亚里士多德的逻辑推理，而是“心灵的凝视”（aspectus mentis），即对认识对象的清楚凝视。由于人的心灵位于上帝与物体之间，并连接它们，所以，人的心灵向上可以理解神的.

the aspectual meaning of a sentence results from interaction between two independent aspectual components , situation type and viewpoint .一个句子的体意义是两个独立的体成分相互作用的结果，这两个体成分是：情景类型和视点。
